title: Grand Opening: Serene Himachal Mountain Escape with Cooking Class, Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Nestled in the lap of the Himalayas in Himachal Pradesh, jüSTa Cliffend Resort & Spa has just swung its doors open to welcome guests with tranquil beauty, blissful services and flawless hospitality. Aesthetically pleasing rooms with endless views of the valley will whisk you away from everyday life, while lip-smacking delicacies await at the multi-cuisine restaurant, and a cosy café offers warming beverages and sweet treats. A heated infinity pool provides a unique perspective on the valley, while a rejuvenating spa, games room and kids' activity zone will keep travellers of all ages relaxed and entertained.

Just 4.5 hours from Chandigarh International Airport (IXC), this breathtaking area offers treks and nature trails arranged by the resort staff (additional charges apply) to keep the adventurers in you occupied. Serenity at your doorstep? jüSTa Cliffend Resort & Spa it is!
offer_address: Baldeyan-Seri Road, Mashobra, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171007 India
